member.name: D2D1_EXPOSURE_PROP
member.summary: Identifiers for properties of the Exposure effect.

member.name: D2D1_EXPOSURE_PROP.D2D1_EXPOSURE_PROP_EXPOSURE_VALUE
member.summary: The D2D1_EXPOSURE_PROP_EXPOSURE_VALUE property is a float value that specifies how much to increase or decrease the exposure of the image. The allowed range is -2.0 to 2.0. The default value is 0.0 (no change).
